thread.title: BRIEF-ATA Enters Framework Agreement For Strategic Investment In B2B International Education Travel

title: BRIEF-ATA Enters Framework Agreement For Strategic Investment In B2B International Education Travel

organizations.name: in b2b international education travel reuters

text: March 26, 2018 / 12:16 PM / in 5 minutes BRIEF-ATA Enters Framework Agreement For Strategic Investment In B2B International Education Travel Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 26 (Reuters) - ATA Inc: * ATA ANNOUNCES ENTRY INTO FRAMEWORK AGREEMENT FOR STRATEGIC INVESTMENT IN CHINESE SERVICE PROVIDER OF B2B INTERNATIONAL EDUCATION TRAVEL * ATA - UNDER TERMS OF AGREEMENT, ATA WILL PROVIDE US$2.0 MILLION IN CONVERTIBLE BONDS, VALID FOR ONE YEAR AT AN 8% INTEREST RATE, TO BEIJING BIZTOUR * ATA INC - ATA WILL BE GRANTED A 6-MONTH EXCLUSIVE NEGOTIATION PERIOD WITH BEIJING BIZTOUR DURING WHICH ATA WILL CONDUCT DUE DILIGENCE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
